languages.text: {n}На вас взирает животное, которому нравится убивать. Нет, не нравится — оно просто убивает, без радости и удовольствия. Такова его природа.{/n}
{n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На вас взирает животное, которому нравится убивать. Нет, не нравится — оно просто убивает, без радости и удовольствия. Такова его природа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are staring in the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it — it just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because such is its nature.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous plongez votre regard dans celui d'un animal qui prend plaisir à semer la mort. Non, ce n'est pas cela : il n'y prend aucun plaisir. Il se contente de tuer, sans ressentir la moindre satisfaction. Il tue, car c'est dans sa nature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous plongez votre regard dans celui d'un animal qui prend plaisir à semer la mort. Non, ce n'est pas cela : il n'y prend aucun plaisir. Il se contente de tuer, sans ressentir la moindre satisfaction. Il tue, car c'est dans sa nature.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}你眼前的人仿佛凶兽一样，目光中充满了对杀戮的痴迷。不，这只凶兽并不痴迷于杀戮，它只是在单纯地杀戮，没有一丝愉悦或乐趣，仅仅是出于本能在不断杀戮罢了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你眼前的人仿佛凶兽一样，目光中充满了对杀戮的痴迷。不，这只凶兽并不痴迷于杀戮，它只是在单纯地杀戮，没有一丝愉悦或乐趣，仅仅是出于本能在不断杀戮罢了。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが見つめているのは殺しを楽しむ獣の目だ。いや、その獣は楽しんでいるのではない。ただ殺しているだけで、そこに喜びも楽しみも見出していない。それが自然の節理だから殺すのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが見つめているのは殺しを楽しむ獣の目だ。いや、その獣は楽しんでいるのではない。ただ殺しているだけで、そこに喜びも楽しみも見出していない。それが自然の節理だから殺すのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du starrst in die Augen eines Tiers, das Vergnügen am Töten empfindet. Nein, kein Vergnügen. Er tötet einfach, ohne Freude oder Vergnügen dabei zu empfinden. Es tötet, weil es in seiner Natur liegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du starrst in die Augen eines Tiers, das Vergnügen am Töten empfindet. Nein, kein Vergnügen. Er tötet einfach, ohne Freude oder Vergnügen dabei zu empfinden. Es tötet, weil es in seiner Natur liegt.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Miras fijamente a los ojos de un animal que disfruta matando. No, en realidad no es que lo disfrute. Simplemente mata, sin hallar placer o deleite en ello. Mata porque está en su naturaleza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Miras fijamente a los ojos de un animal que disfruta matando. No, en realidad no es que lo disfrute. Simplemente mata, sin hallar placer o deleite en ello. Mata porque está en su naturaleza.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Öldürmekten hoşlanan bir hayvanın gözlerine dik dik bakıyorsun. Hayır, aslında hoşlanmıyor. Öldürüveriyor ama bu esnada hiç zevk almıyor, mest olmuyor. Doğası gereği öldürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are staring into the eyes of an animal that enjoys killing. No, it does not enjoy it. It just kills, finding no joy or delight in doing so. It kills because that is its nature.{/n}
